h3.a: Jr. Civitan Teddy Bears for Elders Drive

div.p: Last week our Jr. Civitan members delivered more than sixty-five teddy bears to residents of Burlington’s Twin Lakes. Students were able to spend time conversing with the residents and spreading […]

div.p: Our CGS Band hosted a wonderful Valentine’s Day Dance last Friday!

div.div: Clover Garden School will foster community, generate enthusiasm, challenge students academically, and produce successful citizens.

div.h3: Clover Garden School is a dynamic, K-12 charter school. Our focus is providing excellence today so our students can enjoy success tomorrow.
div.p: We have a strong tradition of excellence and it shows in our students, teachers, and staff. See for yourself the difference that sets us apart!
